original_text: When Bathsheba went to King Solomon to speak to him for Adonijah, the king stood up to meet her, bowed down to her and sat down on his throne. He had a throne brought for the king’s mother, and she sat down at his right hand.
korean_text: 밧세바가 이에 아도니야를 위하여 말하려고 솔로몬 왕에게 이르니 왕이 일어나 영접하여 절한 후에 다시 왕좌에 앉고 그의 어머니를 위하여 자리를 베푸니 그가 그의 오른쪽에 앉는지라

sentences.original_text: When Bathsheba went to King Solomon
to speak to him for Adonijah
the king stood up to meet her
and sat down on his throne
He had a throne brought for the king's mother
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕의 어머니를 위해 왕좌를 가져오게 했다

sentences.original_text: and she sat down at his right hand
